description:
An easy to use tool that creates optimal cutting plans and accurate costings that you can have confidence in. Input panel sizes and materials, MaxCut does the restâ€¦

MaxCut is designed for your growing cabinetry business. An easy to use cutlist optimizer that creates optimal cutting plans and accurate costings that you can have confidence in.
- Save a fortune on materials! Cut the sheet to its full potential. Avoid costly saw operator mistakes. No more expensive offcuts lying around your workshop or in the bin.
- Accurate quotations. Generate cabinetry quotations quickly, accurately and efficiently, knowing you have the right price and the correct number of sheets for the job every time.
- All the reports you need. Print to email cut lists, supplier order lists, cabinet labels, professional quotes and more with no extra effort.
New Features
- Keyboard Shortcut Discovery
  - Added an overlay that reveals available keyboard shortcuts directly next to UI elements.
  - Users can see the overlaid keyboard shortcuts by holding the '?' (question mark) key.
  - Makes shortcuts easier to discover and helps power users work faster without having to memorize key combinations.

Updates
- Expanded Support Bundle Logging
  - The support bundle now includes additional logs to provide clearer insight into errors and issues users may encounter.
  - This reduces back-and-forth requests for information and speeds up issue diagnosis.
  - Click here to see important information to speed up support requests.

Fixes
- CSV Import Defaults When Columns Are Skipped
  - When CSV columns are blank or ignored, MaxCut now correctly applies the user-defined Input Item Default Settings.
  - This results in consistent, predictable imports that match the defaults configured by the user.
- Exact-Fit Panel Optimization (Beta Engine)
  - The beta optimization engine now successfully completes optimization when panels fit a sheet perfectly.
  - Valid, exact-fit layouts are now handled correctly without requiring size adjustments.
